017package com.github.siroshun09.mccommand.bukkit.paper;
018
019/**
020 * A class to check if the server software is Paper or a fork of it.
021 */
022public final class PaperChecker {
023
024    private PaperChecker() {
025        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
026    }
027
028    /**
029     * Checks for the existence of the {@link com.destroystokyo.paper.event.server.AsyncTabCompleteEvent} class.
030     *
031     * @return {@code true} if the class exists, {@code false} otherwise.
032     */
033    public static boolean check() {
034        try {
035            Class.forName("com.destroystokyo.paper.event.server.AsyncTabCompleteEvent");
036            return true;
037        } catch (ClassNotFoundException var1) {
038            return false;
039        }
040    }
041}
